description: Un-blocks the user specified in the ID parameter for the authenticating user. Returns the un-blocked user when successful. If relationships existed before the block was instantiated, they will not be restored.

parameters.description: The screen name of the potentially blocked user. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid screen name is also a user ID.
parameters.name: screen_name

parameters.description: The ID of the potentially blocked user. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid user ID is also a valid screen name.
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: The entities node will not be included when set to false .
parameters.name: include_entities

parameters.description: When set to either true , t or 1 statuses will not be included in the returned user objects.
parameters.name: skip_status
